# distanceOffset

**Instance Property**

A distance from the origin where the falloff begins.

## Declaration

```swift
var distanceOffset: Double
```

## Discussion

Use an offset value that is less than [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpatialForceFalloff/bounds].
title: distanceOffset
